[Default Proposal]
Cafe24 AI Solution

1. Target: Person in charge of government e-commerce related department or e-commerce related business manager
2. Proposer: Cafe24 (Korea's representative global e-commerce platform operator)
3. Proposal Title: Cafe24 E-Commerce AI Solution (Edibot Series)
4. Introduction of proposed solutions
* Eddybot is an AI service that analyzes and classifies hundreds of product images in just a few seconds with an artificial intelligence big data-based shopping mall content creation/editing function and automatically completes detailed pages. With various templates, it makes creating product detail pages even simpler.Automatic image analysis using AI
=================================

Eddybot automatically classifies uploaded images according to model/color/detailed images and arranges them based on big data, resulting in a detailed product page. AI recognition of image categories and colors makes it easy to create pages and recommend necessary product information.User-friendly UI like a blog
============================

Eddybot offers a user-friendly interface, similar to a blog, allowing even beginners to easily handle content creation with just a few clicks and drags for text input, image placement, and video insertion.Trendy frames and stickers
==========================

Eddybot provides a free frame function for placing images and various sticker functions to encourage purchasing. Custom templates can be created for product pages.
* Edibot Design allows even beginners without design expertise in HTML and CSS to design their own customized shopping mall with just a few clicks. It creates sophisticated shopping mall designs optimized for both PC and mobile environments.Easy shopping mall design creation
==================================

Anyone can easily create a sophisticated shopping mall design, even without design production skills such as HTML and CSS. Simply drag and drop with a mouse to change the layout according to desired configurations.Automatically optimized for PC and mobile
=========================================

Edibot Design provides a free responsive theme that resizes automatically for optimization in various mobile environments, such as PCs, smartphones, and tablets.Large number of free design sources
===================================

Over 1500 different design sources, such as icons and menu area designs, are provided to customize various design areas, such as the shopping mall main screen, product menu, and review page.
